name: MobileReport
overview:
GoReport® is a mobile and web application that allows construction and built environment professionals such as surveyors to capture data on site using an iPad and to automatically generate a report. Like an ideal personal assistant, GoReport® takes pictures, transcribes notes, makes sketches, formats data, carries all your equipment and produces a professional report, saving you time that can be better spent out on site, or on other revenue generating activities.

The application is ideal for professionals in a number of sectors including construction, property & built environment, insurance, health & safety compliance, environmental and engineering. GoReport® can add significant value to your company by freeing up your time to carry out work that generates revenue. It streamlines the admin process, standardises reports across your company, improves the quality of reports and facilitates a fast report turnaround time for clients.
